channel.title: Project 06 Remake almost 7.5k View's and almost 800+ downloads
channel.description:
Well today im releasing my remake of 2006 because i got tired of adding everything and i feel as if its not worth my time to continue because i got alot of crap going on such as football and working out and so forth that im home only 3 hrs a day. So here it is.. 1.2k views and 140 downloads at 7/3/2012 10:39
[b][size=14pt]Base:[/size][/b]PI/emu
[IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/2w5k61k.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/14vn4ao.png[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/345etsx.png[/img] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mnwXzHo29Dw[/youtube] [youtube]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=yfkPLtoVa80[/youtube] __________________________________________________________________________ 4.0 - Skills and other features in progress
[b][size=14pt]Combat:[/size][/b] *PvP fully complete *Perfect max hit formulas *Perfect accuracy formula *Equipment requirements
[b][size=14pt]Magic:[/size][/b] [color=]*Every modern combat spell *Can't mage through walls *Staves that give unlimited amount of runes working[/color] *Bones to bananas *Bones to Peache's *Weakening spells *bind, snare, entangle *Teleports, teleothers *Alching *Superheat *Enchanting jewelry
[b][size=14pt]Prayer:[/size][/b] *All bones bury-able *Every prayer working properly *Prayer bonus affects prayer drain rate
[b][size=14pt]Mining:[/size][/b] *Emptying and refilling rocks *All ores can be mined *Correct pickaxe finding and animations *Prospecting *Random chance of obtaining gems *Correct depleting of rocks chance algorithms
[b][size=14pt]Firemaking:[/size][/b] [color=green]*All logs light able *Adding and depleting of lightened logs *Ashes appear after logs burn out *Correct animations *Clipped[/color]
[b][size=14pt]Woodcutting:[/size][/b] *Stumps and regrowing trees *Correct hatchet finding *Correct hatchet animations *Most trees cut-able except regular tree
[b][size=14pt]Crafting: 40%[/size][/b] [color=]*Cutting gems *Making amulets, necklaces, and rings *Stringing amulets *Tanning normal and hard leather *Crafting normal and hard leather.. *Spinning wool *Making pottery
[b][size=14pt]Cooking:[/size][/b] *All fish can be cooked *All meats can be cooked *Grinding wheat into flour *Cakes *Pies *Pizza *Stew [color=yellow]*Wine[/color] *Correct burning formula *Lumbridge cooking range bonus *Eating food (in pieces) *Correct animation and timing used
[b][size=14pt]Rune Crafting:[/size][/b] *Multiple rune crafting *All alters *Pouches *Talisman Locating
[b][size=14pt]Quests:[/size][/b] Cook's Assistant Deserts Treasure Doric's Quest Horror From the Deep Recipe for disaster Black Knights' Fortress Witch's Potion etc.
[b][size=14pt]Tutorial Island:[/size][/b] [color=red]*RuneScape Instructor *Fishing/Woodcutting/Firemaking Instructor *Cooking instructor *Quest instructor *Mining/Smithing instructor *Combat instructor *Money instructor *Prayer instructor *Magic instructor *Correct hint arrows *Doors
Credits: Izumi Sanity Matt Infamy
[size=36pt]Download Section[/size]
[size=18pt]Client + Source download[/size]
http://up.ht/LU1cx3
[size=18pt]Cache Download[/size] http://up.ht/M67dVc

item.dc:creator: @mr_extremez mr extremez
item.description:
@mr_extremez wrote:

[quote=“soapeater3, post:106, topic:447292”]Sorry to ask a stupid question but where do i change ip in server?[/quote]In the client open up client.java search for server = and change that ip to the ip of your server or localhost.

Edit: Sorry for the 2 month bump wasn’t paying attention saw it was in my unread replies.

item.title: Project 06 Remake almost 7.5k View's and almost 800+ downloads
item.dc:creator: @Momrocker Momrocker
item.description:
@Momrocker wrote:

purecoolbow:

i cant seem to get server to go online and im not a noob just dont understand what im doing wrong i have already changed it in client.java

[quote=“bulldog911, post:100, topic:447292”]I think there is a problem with the client? because it’s all online just when i go to login it say’s “No response from server login, try again in 5 seconds” if anyone could help i would really appreciate it. Client.java has the correct ip in there so bugger’s me what it could be. Source is all online correctly done.

EDIT: okay so i found a client that work’s only problem now is that my character is invisible little help please? :/[/quote]

For both of you, in the client folder, look for client.java and search “server =”, there are two values so if you don’t change both of them the client wont connect, it’ll just keep trying to connect to the IP it was uploaded with which is obviously invalid.

I’ve tried using the moparscape client to connect to this server but I get the same invisible character problem, I think it has something to do with the new PI base but I could be very wrong on that. The client that was available with it works great though.

AnderRoo:

any chance someone can upload their copy for me? I’d love to use this as a starting base.

I started working on this server for fun, if anyone browsing this wants a download that’s being updated daily you can download using SVN from here: http://code.google.com/p/et06/source/list

So far I’ve fixed woodcutting completely, added/fixed/activated a lot of the scripts that were written but never used, added/fixed a lot of shops, made an entirely new drop algorithm, bankers face right way, lots of doors/ladders/stairs that didn’t work before work now, skillbooks 100% complete, and ancient magick teleports are fully functional, amongst other things.

If anybody needs help with the particulars of this server feel free to PM me or reply here and I’ll give you some pointers.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @SivanScape SivanScape
item.description:
@SivanScape wrote:

Broo please help, I’ve spend 30-40 hours… Made a complete f2p 2006 scape remake… Removed all memb content and lots more…
But bro I just realised there are drops, but which file is drops??? please respond asap… rlly appreciated… is it npcConstants.tsm??? it cant be
I cleared it all, yet there is still drops.

Just got drops left and quests… pls help bro ty It’s emberassing coding since 2008 and somehow stuck on this LOOL??

Also your client doesnt work when I run it??? I added the cache and compiled it and no errors… but when I run it I get an error and crash.
Please help, thanks! You did a great job and gave me a great start for this possible future success.

Read full topic
